laboratory_examinations.findings: INR is 8 today, which is outside the normal range (usually at range ___).
Serum creatinine value of 1.6, with estimated GFR = 33 if non-African-American and 40 if African-American. GFR < 60 indicates Chronic Kidney Disease.
Pulmonary vessels are less engorged, consistent with some improvement in pulmonary venous pressure.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: In comparison with the study of ___, there is little change, except for removal of endotracheal and nasogastric tubes.
